title: Ep123 Pharmaceutical Mischief
description: This week, the gals swallow some bitter pills in the form of a few nasty crimes. Topics include some tainted Tylenol, the unsolved murders involving a wealthy pharma tycoon, and the sickening greed that has led us to a national opioid epidemic. Pop open a fresh bottle of Apothic Brew, consider going holistic, and tune in for Pharmaceutical Mischief.
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
dc:creator: Wine & Crime Podcast
